curam.util.workflow.impl
Class BusinessObjectAssociationSearch

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.workflow.impl.BusinessObjectAssociationSearch

public final class BusinessObjectAssociationSearch
extends java.lang.Object

A business object association represents an association between a task and a row on a database table. This allows a task to be related to any other row of database data, for example, a person or a case. This facility enables Task functionality to be extended and permits custom application functionality to tie any required information to a task.

This class provides a wrapper around some generic searches and count functions for the BizObjAssociation table.

Method Summary
static TaskCount countOpenTasksByBizObjectTypeAndID(BizObjectTypeKey bizObjectTypeKey)
          Returns a count of the active tasks associated with the specified business object association type and business object association identifier.

Method Detail

countOpenTasksByBizObjectTypeAndID

public static TaskCount countOpenTasksByBizObjectTypeAndID(BizObjectTypeKey bizObjectTypeKey)
                                                    throws AppException,
                                                           InformationalException
Returns a count of the active tasks associated with the specified business object association type and business object association identifier. Tasks with a status of Completed or Closed are excluded from the results returned from this function.

Parameters:
bizObjectTypeKey - The business object type and identifier for which a count of all related active tasks will be returned.
Returns:
A count of the active tasks associated with the specified business object association type and business object association identifier.
Throws:
AppException - Generic application exceptions.
InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
